title: Please turn off Developer Tools to access Internet Netbanking.
content:
Dear Concerned,

I'm trying to open an Internet Banking site of a reputed Bank of Bangladesh (https://www.citytouch.com.bd/), where the page opens for a second, but immediately switches on to a Blank Page with a comment like "Please turn off Developer Tools to access Internet Netbanking". However, the same site is accessible in Chrome and other Browsers without any problems. More so, I also can access the same site while browsing Firefox at my android with ease.

I tried all the available solutions from the net, but my efforts went in vain.

Thus, it would be kind if I get an advise to get rid of this problem.

title: Automatisches Ausfüllen
content: Hallo, wenn ich auf ein Feld gehe, wo man den Benutzernamen ausfüllen muss und zwei mal drau klicke, kommen Vorschläge (siehe Bild). Und meine Frage ist, wo ich diese Vorschläge löschen kann, weil diese Vorschläge sind nicht in meinen gespeicherten Passwörtern und Zugangsdaten. Wenn ich ein neue Zugangsdate speicher will, wird mir der eingegebene Benutzername angezeigt, jedoch wenn ich diesen Lösche in Firefoxabout:logins, dann wird er trotzdem vorgeschlagen. Wo muss ich diese löschen? werden die Daten irgendwo auf der festplatte gespeichert? LG Alex
creator: gamingalex778

title: my saved information is gone
content:
hello and good day to whom ever this massage gets to.

I just updated my windows at my work pc and all my programs were deleted and so I got signed out of all my accounts. I reinstalled firefox and tried to sign in but because its been a while I couldn't remember my password and had to reset it. but after all this and when I finally got into my account (with the same email address I was using until now) no matter how many times I click sync, nothing gets added to my bookmarks, history, passwords, etc.

then I checked with one on my phone to see whether that was working or not, and that was signed out as well and asks me to sign in again. I've been using this browser for years now and have many save information on this account I CAN'T LOSE ALL THAT. the primary account was on my laptop which is at home and currently I am terrified of turning that on and finding everything's gone again. please help me get my info back. I can't remember years of saved bookmarks and passwords.

title: Hiba történt a következőhöz csatlakozáskor: www.facebook.com. SSL_ERROR_DC_EXPIRED
content:
Üdvözlöm. Nem tudok a facebook oldalalamra belépni. A telefonon és más számítógépen működik.Ezt írja ki:A biztonságos kapcsolat sikertelen

Hiba történt a következőhöz csatlakozáskor: www.facebook.com. SSL_ERROR_DC_EXPIRED 

   A megtekinteni kívánt oldal nem jeleníthető meg, mert a kapott adatok hitelessége nem ellenőrizhető.    Lépjen kapcsolatba a webhely üzemeltetőjével, és értesítse a problémáról.

Köszönöm előre is a segítséget!
creator: varga.gyozone
